law.text: Notwithstanding any provision of the law to the contrary, the Department of Agriculture shall not enact any administrative regulations prohibiting the rights of buyers of any livestock to purchase the livestock.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 14, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 3.
